data.name: EZ2ON REBOOT : R - Quantum Complex Theme Pack
data.detailed_description:
"The true final form of a quantum processor."

"Quantum Complex" is a Theme Pack for EZ2ON REBOOT : R.

This DLC includes the following contents :

Skins

- 「Quantum Complex」 exclusive system theme
- 「QTZ-01」 panel skin, combo skin, judge skin
- 「QTZ-02」 panel skin, combo skin, judge skin

data.short_description: "The true final form of a quantum processor." Purchase now and get instant access to "Quantum Complex" theme pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-530 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 620 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
